Structured: Provide the answer in a table format.
Refine: Can you clarify this point with a concrete example?
Rephrase this in a more concise and technical manner.
List the assumptions you are making in this explanation.
Coding: Explain this from a performance and maintainability perspective.
Point out potential edge cases or pitfalls.
Twist: Explain this as if you were teaching a beginner.
Explain this to an expert in one paragraph.
Give an alternative perspective or unconventional approach.
Image-gen: Based on all of our previous conversations, generate an image of me as you imagine. Make it super-realistic. Please feel free to fill in any missing information with your own imagination. Do not ask follow-up questions; generate the image immediately.
